A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is AWFUL!! I'm a huge die hard Star Wars fan ever since I was a kid and I wanted to walk out of the theatre.  I'm all for new characters and new plot lines but this was done in bad taste.  Unnecessary jokes\, bad acting\, and completely unnecessary scenes.  Disney has a lot to clean up here and I don't plan on ever going back to the theatre to see new Star Wars movies.  They've ruined it for me.
